name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.key.provider.cache.expiry
description: DFS client security key cache expiration in milliseconds.

name: dfs.webhdfs.ugi.expire.after.access
description:
How long in milliseconds after the last access
      the cached UGI will expire. With 0, never expire.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.throughputInMBperSec
description:
Maximum disk bandwidth used by diskbalancer
      during read from a source disk. The unit is MB/sec.

name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.streams.cache.size
description:
The DFSClient maintains a cache of recently opened file descriptors.
    This parameter controls the maximum number of file descriptors in the cache.
    Setting this higher will use more file descriptors,
    but potentially provide better performance on workloads
    involving lots of seeks.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.transfer.buffer.size
description:
This property is used only if
  mapreduce.shuffle.transferTo.allowed is set to false. In that case,
  this property defines the size of the buffer used in the buffer copy code
  for the shuffle phase. The size of this buffer determines the size of the IO
  requests.

name: dfs.datanode.max.disks.to.report
description:
Number of disks to include in JSON report per operation. We will return
    disks with the highest latency.
